Smart Hairbrush: A hairbrush with sensors that monitor the health of your hair and provide personalized care recommendations based on your hair type, length, and condition.
Hairbrush with Built-in Styling Tools: A hairbrush with built-in straighteners, curling irons, and other styling tools that allow you to style your hair without having to use multiple devices.
Hairbrush with LED Lights: A hairbrush with LED lights that can help you see in low light conditions, making it easier to brush your hair at night.
Hairbrush with Detangling Technology: A hairbrush with detangling technology that can help you easily brush through knots and tangles without pulling on your hair.

Hairbrush with Heatless Styling: A hairbrush with heatless styling technology that allows you to style your hair without using heat, making it a great option for people with damaged or sensitive hair.
